objects.text:
• Ship Across India in 10 Mins
• Quick Commerce for D2C Brands
• Hyperlocal Delivery Solution
• 30% Early Bird Discount

product_details.name: Quick by Shiprocket
product_details.description:
Hyperlocal Delivery?
Ship across India in 10 mins 
Quick Commerce now sorted for every D2C brand. 
30% early discount

banner_details:
The banner is a visually engaging promotional layout divided into four quadrants. The top-left quadrant features a prominent, bold headline (`heading`) in white, paired with a futuristic neon green subheading (`subheading`) beneath it. A strong tagline (`tagline`) emphasizes speed across the same quadrant. The top-right quadrant showcases a lifestyle product image (`product_image`), likely a chair and table set, set against a deep violet background for contrast.

The bottom-left quadrant is used to communicate details in bullet points (`description`), offering key service benefits in clean white text. A subtle vector graphic complements the content visually. The bottom-right quadrant prominently displays pricing (`price`) in white and a call-to-action button background (`cta_background`) in neon green, with the CTA text (`cta`) in a digital-inspired font.

The background consists of quadrant color separations and grid lines that enhance a tech-inspired aesthetic, especially with radar-like and abstract geometric SVG overlays.

**Color Palette:**
- Black (#181818)
- Dark Charcoal (#141413)
- Deep Violet (#442378)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Neon Green (#12F040)
- Light Gray (#f4f4f6)
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated blend of deep teal and gold tones, ideal for creating a modern and elegant advertisement banner. The chair showcases a plush teal upholstery (#0F4C5C) that exudes richness and comfort. Its vertical stitching adds texture while reflecting soft lighting to subtly enhance depth. The golden metal legs (#C8A951) introduce a luxurious contrast, catching the light and drawing the eye. Accents like the light gray cloth (#BFBDB6), white teacup (#F5F5F5), and stone-textured vase (#D9D9D6) add softness. A pop of green from the plant (#6BAA75) injects freshness. This refined palette harmonizes beautifully to create a chic, upscale look.
